attributes.action: Put recycling bins in public places (eg parks, forest walks, zoos, supermarkets)
attributes.additional_details: t's time to make a change and save our planet. If the supermarkets are not going to change from using plastic we need to make sure the general public are doing all they can and have the correct facilities to do so.
attributes.background: Alot of public places have pinic/ eating facilites with only one general waste bin. Alot of food is packaged in plastic which isn't great for the environment. Lots of the public use recyclable materials but when out they do not have the bins to put them in just general waste.
